title: [Large-scale] Effective Teacher Performance Design in Virtual Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-Level Science Fundamental Knowledge and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizes developing teaching strategies suitable for non-face-to-face environments post-COVID-19, including analysis of cases combining synchronous instruction with traditional educational models

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more synchronous instructional strategies for designing science projects in a virtual environment.
Learners can develop two or more science learning scenarios linked to real-world contexts for project-based assessment.
Learners can practice and provide feedback on formative assessment methods using digital tools in large classrooms three or more times.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
